inclusion.criterion: ≥1 peripheral blood cytopenia defined by hemoglobin concentration <12 g/dL for female and <13g/dL for male patients, platelet count <150 x109/L, absolute neutrophil count <1.8 x109/L
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recruitment: Participants will be included in the study once all the screening activities are completed.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: History of or active documented MDS
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Wegener's granulomatosis and is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. He has a positive serum MPO-ANCA in his medical record.
